page.title: 10RELIGION AROUND WIRKSWORTH
page.content: ST. MARY'S PARISH CHURCH IN WIRKSWORTH IS INCREASINGLY WELL ATTENDED WITH SUNDAY SCHOOL, HOLIDAY PLAY SCHEME, A BEAUTIFUL HISTORIC BUILDING, A RECTOR AND CURATE BOTH OF WHOM LIVE LOCALLY. THE BAPTIST CHURCH IN WIRKSWORTH IS VERY WELL ATTENDED WITH SUNDAY SCHOOL AND THRIVING MID-WEEK FELLOWSHIP MEETINGS, TWO MINISTERS, ONE OF WHOM LIVES LOCALLY. THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH AT GORSEY BANK IS SMALL BUT IS WELL ATTENDED, THE PRIESTS LIVE AWAY FROM THE AREA. THE METHODIST CHURCH IN WIRKSWORTH IS NOT WELL ATTENDED WITH SUNDAY SCHOOL AND WEEKNIGHT MEETINGS, THE MINISTER LIVES LOCALLY. WELL DRESSING IS AN ANNUAL RELIGIOUS EVENT, AS IS THE CLYPPING CEREMONY AT THE PARISH CHURCH.
